ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( $CustomMetadata.Custom_Feature_Enablement__mdt.Subscription_Orders.Feature_is_Enabled__c=true,
ISCHANGED( Stage__c),/*if the stage is changed*/
OR( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"Management"), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"Acquisition") ), /*and it's being change to either Management or Acquisition*/
ISBLANK(Utility__r.Number_of_Decimal_Places__c) /*and the number of decimals field on the related utility is null*/ )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Number of Decimals field on the related Utility needs to be filled in before the stage can be set to Management or Acquisition.
